description.value:
Space Orange Juice. Brewed non-alcoholic beverage from lopsided ploin fruit designed to counter poor diets from extended space travel. Can be cheaply fermented into a strong alcohol called "Wobble", or well fermented into a brandy called "Raenka".

Effect: Ubiquitous

Notes: 25 T
